EmailTemplate.subject: Want to join The Challenge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Want to join The Challenge?
We hope that you have enjoyed working with NCS with The Challenge.
We are advertising for new core staff roles to work at The Challenge to set up our 2015 NCS programme.
If you would like to see opportunities to work with us in one of our offices, please go to
http://www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles for the role descriptions.
There are a range of roles available, including Programme Manager and Programme Associate roles in our London and Manchester offices. The roles start in December and the deadline to apply is Friday 26 September.
If you would like to apply, or have any questions, please contact the relevant person via the email address on the role descriptions.
Best Wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter and Facebook https://twitter.com/seasonalstaff https://www.facebook.com/thechallengestaff
